name: Behind Schedule
description:
Back Story - 

Behind Schedule is a game set on the moon. You were a researcher there for 2 years. You are finally heading home. But wake up late due to an alarm issue. You normally would have over an hour to get to the launch site but now only have around 10 minutes. To make matters worse the vehicle you drive has limited fuel and will need refueling during you trip. This is an extremely quiet game. Do not expect too much action. 

-4 Different Endings -Moon Landscape -Moon Gravity -Space -2 Drivable Vehicles

https://github.com/xdLonesome/behind-schedule-moonshot

Submission to Game Off 2020

https://itch.io/jam/game-off-2020/rate/834644
